properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_Q_CD, MEMBER_A FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DT, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_ST = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK,CREATE_DT FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
